channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘Black Panther 3’ is Officially Ryan Coogler’s Next Movie
item.description: You asked, and Coogler's finally confirmed it: his next movie to hit the big screen will be another 'Black Panther.'

item.title: Black Friday 2025 : voici les meilleures offres encore en ligne ce week-end
item.description: La date officielle du Black Friday approche à grands pas et les marchands multiplient les promotions en attendant le jour J, le 28 novembre 2025. Le pré-Black Friday est donc toujours en cours d'un côté, chez Amazon, Boulanger, Fnac, Darty ou encore Cdiscount. Et de l'autre, vous avez le Singles Day qui continue, notamment chez AliExpress et autres sites, aussi appelé 11.11. C'est ici que vous retrouverez le meilleur de ces deux évènements avec les promos les plus intéressantes. ...

item.title: Amazon UK's Black Friday sale starts November 20 – here are the 39 best early deals I'd buy now
item.description: Amazon has confirmed the start date for its mega Black Friday sale, but dozens of deals are already live, so I've hand-picked the 39 best offers.

item.title: On était en Chine pour découvrir le futur des voitures électriques Xpeng : IA, Volkswagen et conduite autonome
item.description: Nous avons eu la chance de participer aux AI Day de Xpeng. L'occasion de découvrir toutes les nouveautés du constructeur chinois, dont certaines en lien avec les voitures Volkswagen.

item.title: Ozempic’s Latest Weight Loss Competition Is Like Nothing We’ve Seen Before
item.description: In an early human trial, Eli Lilly's eloralintide helped people lose up to 20% of their body weight.

item.title: Best Action Cameras (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Gearing up to shred the slopes or dive into the seas? These photography tools are made for danger.

item.title: The Asus Falcata is an ambitious split ergo gaming keyboard that falls short
item.description: Hall effect gaming keyboards aren't uncommon. But Asus' ROG Falcata is the only one that's also a split ergonomic keyboard, aimed at alleviating wrist, hand, or arm pain. For the luxury of having it all, you'll pay $419.99, enough to buy a nice Hall effect keyboard and a split ergonomic one. It'd be worth it […]

item.title: I tested Motorola's cheaper iPhone Air alternative, but it still didn't win me over to team thin-phone
item.description: The Motorola Edge 70 is a surprisingly expensive thin-body Android, which doesn't live up to the expectations past generations have set.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, November 17 (game #1393)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, November 17 (game #890)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, November 17 (game #624)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Sunday's 100 best early Black Friday deals – sales I'm shopping today from Walmart, Amazon, Target, and more
item.description: I'm rounding up Sunday's 100 best Black Friday deals that I've hand-picked from early sales at Walmart, Amazon, Target, Best Buy, and more.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 Plus : il y a 100 € de réduction pour cette tablette familiale (écran 11″, 90 Hz, Dolby Atmos) lors du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Dotée d’un grand écran taillé pour le streaming et la navigation web, la Galaxy Tab A9 Plus assume pleinement son rôle de tablette loisirs dans le salon comme dans la chambre. Et pour le pré-Black Friday, elle se fait encore plus douce sur le porte-monnaie, son prix glisse de 260,99 euros à 159,99 euros chez Darty.

item.title: This is the "worst-selling Microsoft product of all time" - and there's a good reason you've probably never heard of it
item.description: Microsoft’s OS/2 for Mach 20 sold just eleven copies, revealing how innovation without practical value can lead to total market failure.

item.title: Marshall Heston 120 Review: Premium Style, Restrained Sound
item.description: Marshall's first soundbar offers premium sound and style, but misses one crucial element.

item.title: Why AI pilots fail - and how manufacturers can break the cycle
item.description: Too many AI projects stall because organizations fall in love with the technology, not the outcome.

item.title: Amazon MGM+ wanted more ‘personal’ and ‘believable’ Merry Men in Robin Hood episode 4, but you won’t see the biggest change coming
item.description: I can’t get enough of the gender-swapped Merry Men in Robin Hood episode 4, and that’s part of the MGM+ show’s creators ‘plan’.

item.title: 5 ways to manage hypertension or high blood pressure, according to science
item.description: Getting a hypertension notification from your Apple Watch is just the start – now you need to change these 5 key habits.

item.title: How my meal delivery company beat the odds to get to profitability
item.description: A case study in the value of focus In early 2022, the meal delivery company I founded, Tovala, went out to raise $100mm from venture capitalists. Our business could not have been hotter. We’d crossed $110mm of revenue, growing over 100% YoY. We had retention that was 3–4 times better than other meal delivery services. We had low awareness, lots of room for product innovation, and a seemingly clear path to an IPO....

item.title: Amazon slashes the price of this Kindle Colorsoft bundle in an early Black Friday deal
item.description: Amazon slashes the price of the Kindle Colorsoft bundle by £90 in an early Black Friday deal.
